name: media_fastForward
description: This function is used to execute the fast forward function on a TV, audio, or speaker SmartThings device.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to execute the fast forward function.

parameters.name: predefinedCompartment
parameters.description: A predefined compartment for organizing devices.
